title: Another PSA (this one for all you aspiring Yas players)
body:
When you're building into Tri, don't get zeal first. The damage, HP, and movespeed from Phage will help more. You already have a ton of crit from Statikk anyway.

Unless the enemy is super shit, Yas is a mistake-punishing farmer. Don't go ham. When the enemy's retaliate spell (like Ahri charm or talon Q or something) is off CD, E minion, E enemy, Q enemy, E away.

Tbh Yas is ez pz
